A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One off the most disappointing films i've ever seen\, everything from gaping plot holes (made by hyperspace kamikaze attacks) to some off the most boring characters i've ever seen. Dont even get me started on the uninspired alien designs\, what happened to the Star Wars galaxy filled with interesting planets and species? Its just humans and one shot background aliens. \nI could probably go on for hours on everything wrong with this sorry excuse off a Star Wars movie\, but I would just say that the character assassination off Luke is enough to be said.
